name: Where Am I??!
messages: I woke up in a cave with no memory. I need to get some help from others, if I can find them.
I have reached the cave's entrance with an old man relaxing. I need to ask him of help.
Looks like he is of no help. I should explore around then.
I am seeing a large stone structure. I must take a closer inspection.
A portal of such magnificance! Where will it take me? A whole new world?
It would seemed like i was teleported to a strange new world. I must explore around here and survive.

name: A brave new world

stageTriggers.dialougeInput: I lost my memory, it would seem like. All I remember is that I went through a stone portal and then I ended up at the crypt room below.

messages: I have arrived in an old crpt, but I am not scared of the corpses, at least I tell myself.
Ruins?! I don't understand. I must investigate further.
It would seems like going west is a good idea.
